name: Sneaky Bullet
description:
// if the web version isn't working, please download the Windows one (2 MB)

You get only one bullet, Position your hero, aim the direction, shoot... Enemies gets

Controls:

Use [W] and [S] to position the hero, [Mouse] to aim and shoot.

Excuse me if you found bugs , I'll add post game jam with fixes if needed. Thank you! ^-^)
